7// system_utils.cpp: Implementation of common functions
8
9#include "common/system_utils.h"
10
11#include <stdlib.h>
12
13namespace angle
14{
15std::string GetExecutableName()
16{
17#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_ANDROID) && __ANDROID_API__ >= 21
18 // Support for "getprogname" function in bionic was introduced in L (API level 21)
19 const char *executableName = getprogname();
20 return (executableName) ? std::string(executableName) : "ANGLE";
21#else
22 std::string executableName = GetExecutablePath();
23 size_t lastPathSepLoc = executableName.find_last_of(GetPathSeparator());
24 return (lastPathSepLoc > 0 ? executableName.substr(lastPathSepLoc + 1, executableName.length())
25 : "ANGLE");
26#endif // ANGLE_PLATFORM_ANDROID
27}
28
29// On Android return value cached in the process environment, if none, call
30// GetEnvironmentVarOrUnCachedAndroidProperty if not in environment.
31std::string GetEnvironmentVarOrAndroidProperty(const char *variableName, const char *propertyName)
32{
33#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_ANDROID) && __ANDROID_API__ >= 21
34 // Can't use GetEnvironmentVar here because that won't allow us to distinguish between the
35 // environment being set to an empty string vs. not set at all.
36 const char *variableValue = getenv(variableName);
37 if (variableValue != nullptr)
38 {
39 std::string value(variableValue);
40 return value;
41 }
42#endif
43 return GetEnvironmentVarOrUnCachedAndroidProperty(variableName, propertyName);
44}
45
46// Call out to 'getprop' on a shell to get an Android property. If the value was set, set an
47// environment variable with that value. Return the value of the environment variable.
48std::string GetEnvironmentVarOrUnCachedAndroidProperty(const char *variableName,
49 const char *propertyName)
50{
51#if defined(ANGLE_PLATFORM_ANDROID) && __ANDROID_API__ >= 21
52 std::string sanitizedPropertyName = propertyName;
53 sanitizedPropertyName.erase(
54 std::remove(sanitizedPropertyName.begin(), sanitizedPropertyName.end(), '\''),
55 sanitizedPropertyName.end());
56
57 std::string command("getprop '");
58 command += sanitizedPropertyName;
59 command += "'";
60
61 // Run the command and open a I/O stream to read the value
62 constexpr int kStreamSize = 64;
63 char stream[kStreamSize] = {};
64 FILE *pipe = popen(command.c_str(), "r");
65 if (pipe != nullptr)
66 {
67 fgets(stream, kStreamSize, pipe);
68 pclose(pipe);
69 }
70
71 // Right strip white space
72 std::string value(stream);
73 value.erase(value.find_last_not_of(" \n\r\t") + 1);
74
75 // Set the environment variable with the value.
76 SetEnvironmentVar(variableName, value.c_str());
77 return value;
78#endif // ANGLE_PLATFORM_ANDROID
79 // Return the environment variable's value.
80 return GetEnvironmentVar(variableName);
81}
82
83bool PrependPathToEnvironmentVar(const char *variableName, const char *path)
84{
85 std::string oldValue = GetEnvironmentVar(variableName);
86 const char *newValue = nullptr;
87 std::string buf;
88 if (oldValue.empty())
89 {
90 newValue = path;
91 }
92 else
93 {
94 buf = path;
95 buf += GetPathSeparatorForEnvironmentVar();
96 buf += oldValue;
97 newValue = buf.c_str();
98 }
99 return SetEnvironmentVar(variableName, newValue);
100}
101} // namespace angle
